titles.title: Impeaching President Joseph Robinette Biden, President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
Impeaching President Joseph Robinette Biden, President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches President Biden for high crimes and misdemeanors for various actions, including relating to alleged influence peddling by his family and activity along the southern border.
